articles.description: Moses, Dhanya, Narendra, and Debashree use tech to empower themselves and others with disabilities. With Apple's support, they've been able to improve lives of thousands. Tech features like VoiceOver, Magnifier, and AssistiveTouch help them access content, ty…

articles.title: Apple Watch Series 9 Product RED Edition Debuts to Celebrate World AIDS Day - MySmartPrice
articles.description: Apple Watch Series 9 Product RED edition is official in India. The Cupertino giant has also announced various offers with the product.

articles.title: The Nothing Phones are discounted in Germany, you can get a Pixel phone too - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The Nothing Phone (2) is the company's current flagship, while its original Phone (1) is sticking around as a mid-range option.
articles.content: Nothing is yet to branch out into multiple phone lines right now the Nothing Phone (2) is its flagship, the older Phone (1) is sticking around as the mid-ranger. You can pick it up for 320 for an 8/1… [+3019 chars]
